summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Darren K. Indyke's attorney trust account for the month of July 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, as well as instructions for reporting errors in transactions.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is the account holder of the attorney trust account detailed in the financial statement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned in the context of providing personal assistance related to the account.

keyFacts: The document details the account balance for Darren K. Indyke's attorney trust account as of July 31, 2015.
The beginning balance was $50.00, with no checks paid or withdrawals made during the month.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees during the statement period.
The account is held at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
